articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky thanked the national team for "two hours of happiness" after it produced a magical performance to beat Scotland 3-1 in its World Cup playoff semifinal on Wednesday.
articles.content: Glasgow, Scotland (CNN)Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky thanked the national team for "two hours of happiness" after it produced a magical performance to beat Scotland 3-1 in its World Cup play… [+2394 chars]
